text:
[Verse]
Raindrops on my window
Dance into my mind
Clouds are gone they whisper
Hard to leave behind

[Chorus]
Sunshine breakin' through now
Brightens up the day
Hold the memories closer
Wish they wouldn't fade

[Verse 2]
Puddles on the sidewalk
Reflect the city lights
Childhood dreams and laughter
Sunny days and nights

[Chorus]
Sunshine breakin' through now
Brightens up the day
Hold the memories closer
Wish they wouldn't fade

[Bridge]
Rain and sun together
Paint a pretty sky
Mixed emotions linger
As the moments fly

[Verse 3]
Endless cycle turning
Dark and light will blend
Find the beauty always
Sun and rain my friend
title: Rainy Days and Sunshine
